column1: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Qacha's Nek (Latin: Qachasneken(sis)) is a diocese located in the city of Qacha’s Nek in the Ecclesiastical province of Maseru in Lesotho.

column2: 1961: Established as Diocese of Qacha’s Nek from Diocese of Maseru

column1: Bishops of Qacha’s NekJoseph Delphis Des Rosiers
